name: Lone Star Galaxy Ranger
description:
Didn't have time to add a story bit to the start of the game so i'll just write it here.

A robot gang kicks you out of a bar in there territory so you kill them all and go after the boss.

Controls

A,D left and right

W,S aim up and down

Space to jump

Ctrl to crouch and slide

Enter to shoot

You can slide under the boss.
